import React from 'react'; type Props = { tabs: number, setTabs: (x: number) => any, firstName: string, lastName: string, email: string, phoneNumber: string, editMode: boolean, userInfo: any }; export const PersonalInformation = (props: Props) => { return
{userInfo ? (
setFirstName(e.target.value)}/> setLastName(e.target.value)}/> setEmail(e.target.value)}/> setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)}/>
) : null}
}
